topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack 1.1: Updates and Extensions

body.p: HPE provides a simple mechanism for downloading and publishing the content and updates for the Undercloud node.

li.xref: Register on the Helion Distribution Network (HDN)

section.title: Register for Helion Distribution Network Access
section.p: You cannot access the updates from the HPE Helion Horizon undercloud dashboard unless you are a registered user.
To register on the Helion Distribution Network:

ol.li: On the HPE Helion Horizon undercloud dashboard, click the Admin tab in the left panel.
Click Updates and Extensions and then select Updates and Extensions to open the Updates and Extensions page.
Click Configure in the top-right corner of the page to display the Configure dialog box.
Click Sign up Now below the description in the Configure dialog box. The page navigates to the HP Helion Product Catalog. Then, do the following:
Click Sign In in the top of the page to open the HPE Web ID dialog box.
Click Sign Up for Web ID to create log-in credentials. The HPE WEB ID dialog box is displayed.
Enter the required details.
Select the check box next to I agree to the Terms of Use to accept the terms and conditions.
Click Submit.The credentials are authenticated and the account is created.

section.p: Once you register on the HPE Helion Product Catalog, you are required to configure your credentials.

ol.li: On the HPE Helion Horizon undercloud dashboard, click the Admin tab in the left panel.
Click Updates and Extensions and then select Updates and Extensions to open the Updates and Extensions page.
Click Configure in the top-right corner of the page to display the Configure dialog box.
In the User Name box, enter the email ID that you have created while setting up your account in the HPE Helion Product Catalog.
In the Password box, enter the password that you have created for your account in the HP Helion Product Catalog.

Click OK to save the details.The Updates and Extensions page is displayed with the list of available patches.
Or
Click Cancel to abort and go to the previous screen.

section.title: Import and install
section.p: To import a package that is stored on your local system, take the following steps:

ol.li: On the HPE Helion Horizon undercloud dashboard, click the Admin tab in the left panel. The tab displays an option in the left panel.
Click Updates and Extensions and then select Updates and Extensions to open the Updates and Extensions page.
Click Import in the top-right corner of the page. An import dialog box is displayed.
Click Browse to select and import the .csu file.The imported file is displayed in the Import dialog box. Only CSU files are supported.

Click Import.The file is imported to your local cloud and displayed in the Updates and Extensions page.
Or
Click Cancel to abort and go to the previous screen.
Click Publish to install the imported file. The Publish dialog box is displayed.
Click Publish. A message is displayed after successful installation.
(Optional) To view the progress of the installation, click the More drop-down list and select View Progress.

section.title: Download a package
section.p: Perform the following steps to download the packages:

ol.li: On the HPE Helion Horizon undercloud dashboard, click the Admin tab in the left panel.
Click Updates and Extensions and then select Updates and Extensions to open the Updates and Extensions page.

Click Download to download the file to your local system, if the file is being downloaded for the first time. Or Click the More drop-down list and select Download next to the package that you want to download on your local system. A Confirm Download Update dialog box is displayed.

Click Download to download the package. A message is displayed when the .csu file is successfully downloaded.
Or
Click Cancel to abort and go to the previous screen.

(Optional) To view the download status, click the More drop-down list and select View Progress. The View Progress box is displayed, containing the log, updated name, updated version, task type, and the status of the task.
